text:
Are you interested in contributing to the design and development of the next generation of intelligent learning technologies? Come and join our team @uqITaLI where we combine #AI and #crowdsourcing to enhance student learning.  
Info about the position at https://t.co/RQHe6bjulL https://t.co/gRYlE0YMEf
@alywise Thank you so much Alyssa for your kind words and the retweet!
@phillipdawson @Deakin @CRADLEdeakin @DeakinREDI Huge congrats to you, David, @r_ajjawi and other colleagues in @CRADLEdeakin and @DeakinREDI. Very well deserved!

We present a practical application of our approach using data from a course with 875 students. We show that instructors can gain interesting insights by using intelligent LADs; however, a risk of inequity still exists. 5/5

Our approach responds to concerns related to FATE by refraining from automatically labelling students; instead, it uses AI in LADs to guide data exploration while still reserving judgement about interpreting student learning to instructors. 4/5
